movies.title: Kantara A Legend: Chapter 1
movies.description: Exploring the origins of Kaadubettu Shiva during the Kadamba dynasty era, it delves into the untamed wilderness and forgotten lore surrounding his past.

movies.title: Bad Girl
movies.description: From her journey through high school and college, then out into the wider world, Ramya's dream of finding the perfect guy is obstructed by societal mores, strict parents, unrequited love and the untrammelled chaos of her own mind.

movies.title: Mirai
movies.description: A warrior is tasked with the protection nine sacred scriptures that can turn any mortal into a deity.

movies.title: Kishkindhapuri
movies.description: During a ghost tour, visitors enter an old radio station where they disturb a dormant spirit. Now trapped inside, they must find a way to escape as supernatural forces threaten their lives.

movies.title: Mirage
movies.description: Abhirami seeks her missing fiancé Kiran, joining forces with journalist Aswin. Their investigation reveals an intricate web of secrets, drawing them into a mystery more complex than anticipated.

movies.title: Maareesan
movies.description: In an unusual situation , Velayudham sets out on a journey with Dhaya from Nagercoil to Tiruvannamalai-a journey that will alter both their lives in ways they never imagined. What unfolds becomes the heart of the story.

movies.title: Pani
movies.description: When the peaceful married life of a couple is unexpectedly disrupted by two youngsters with criminal inclination, the trials and tribulations connect the mobster lives of Thrissur by becoming a part of vengeance.

movies.title: Eleven
movies.description: A brave and skilled officer with a strong record of solving tough cases is assigned to a new, more challenging serial killing investigation.

movies.title: Blind Spot
movies.description: Officer Vikram investigates when Divya's apparent suicide turns into a murder case. He must navigate through suspects including her husband, stepchildren, and maid as he uncovers secrets and lies.

movies.title: Eagle
movies.description: A journalist uncovers the story of a ruthless assassin when she investigates a government cover up.

movies.title: Simbaa
movies.description: Environmental activist Purushottam Reddy, alias Simbaa, wages a battle against industrial pollution. Saving three lives sparks their gratitude journey, fueling a quest to bring justice against nature's adversaries.

movies.title: Kantara
movies.description: When greed paves the way for betrayal, scheming and murder, a young tribal reluctantly dons the traditions of his ancestors to seek justice.

movies.title: Barroz: Guardian of Treasures
movies.description: For 400 years, Barroz, a loyal servant, has guarded da Gama's treasure. Bound by a centuries-old magic, he awaits the arrival of a true descendant worthy of claiming it.

movies.title: Rangasthalam
movies.description: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

movies.title: Marco
movies.description: The adoptive son of the Adattu family, Marco, sets off on a ruthless quest for vengeance after his brother is brutally murdered, finding only betrayal, loss and unimaginable brutality at every step.

movies.title: Bagheera
movies.description: When society turns into a jungle, just one predator cries out for justice.

movies.title: Pushpa: The Rule - Part 2
movies.description: A smuggling kingpin faces off against a vengeful rival while manipulating politics, making big deals, and navigating tense confrontations. A public apology leads to a dramatic showdown, ending with challenge.

movies.title: Alanaati Ramachandrudu
movies.description: Siddhu an ambivert guy, loves Dharani an extrovert girl, but hesitates to express his love due to his perceived boredom. Unexpectedly, he uses a lie to express his love,will he make use of it and make his love life success?

movies.title: Sindhubaadh
movies.description: It's a story of a common man Thiru who ventures out from his comfort zone looking to make money and becomes Sindhubaadh.

movies.title: Jango
movies.description: A neurosurgeon who is stuck in a time loop tries to save his estranged wife from being killed by a mystery man.

movies.title: Matka
movies.description: Rising through the ranks of the criminal world, a man becomes a key player in a massive nationwide gambling operation.

movies.title: Lucky Baskhar
movies.description: A cash-strapped cashier working at a bank embarks on a risky investment scheme and soon gets drawn into the murky world of money laundering.

movies.title: Romeo
movies.description: A husband tries to win the love of his wife, who marries him because of familial obligation.

movies.title: Kalinga
movies.description: A protagonist encounters terrifying events, uncovering a sinister mystery lurking beneath the surface.

movies.title: Karataka Dhamanaka
movies.description: A jailer sends two fraudsters to his village to convince and get his adamant father to the city. But the frauds do something extraordinary than the task.

movies.title: Raayan
movies.description: A series of unfortunate events lead Raayan, a simpleton to be dragged into the dreaded world of crime and manipulation.

movies.title: Premalu
movies.description: Sachin's quest for love takes unexpected turns, creating a laughter-filled love triangle.

movies.title: Jagame Thandhiram
movies.description: A nomadic gangster finds himself caught between good and evil in a fight for a place to call home. Starring Dhanush, Aishwarya Lekshmi and James Cosmo.

movies.title: Salaar
movies.description: The fate of a violently contested kingdom hangs on the fraught bond between two friends-turned-foes in this saga of power, bloodshed and betrayal.

movies.title: Spy
movies.description: After receiving the news of the death of his elder brother Subash, who worked for R&AW, Jay sets out on a mission to find out what happened leading him into a bigger conspiracy of a possible nuclear attack threat to the country.

movies.title: Janaki Jaane
movies.description: Struggling with panic disorder, Janaki is ecstatic when Unni Mukundan proposes to marry her. Things go south when Janaki's fears land her in serious trouble.

movies.title: Dasara
movies.description: A brutal act sends an irresponsible small-time criminal on a mission of revenge.

movies.title: Ravanasura
movies.description: Junior lawyer Ravindra is a goof whom no one seems to take seriously. But there's more to him beneath the surface.

movies.title: Viduthalai Part 2
movies.description: An unassuming school teacher faces extreme circumstances, forcing him to take up arms and lead a fiery rebellion against oppression, becoming an unlikely leader.

movies.title: Maaveeran
movies.description: A cowardly cartoonist starts being 'controlled' by a cartoon action figure, and takes on a corrupt politician.

movies.title: Bro
movies.description: An arrogant man is given a second chance to fix his mistakes after death.

movies.title: Pichaikkaran 2
movies.description: A business tycoon being preyed on for his wealth, and a beggar on a constant hunt for his long-lost sister. How does money determine the fate of these two lives?

movies.title: O Saathiya
movies.description: The evolving love story of Arjun and Keerthi and the trials and tribulations they face as they mature from adolescence to adulthood.

movies.title: Kabali
movies.description: A reformed gangster is released from prison and attempts to protect his family from his enemies.

movies.title: Sufiyum Sujatayum
movies.description: Sujata, a married woman living in Dubai, rediscovers her past love for a Sufi priest when her husband brings her back to their village, leading to a musical love story that explores the complexities of her situation.

movies.title: Jaani Dushman: Ek Anokhi Kahani
movies.description: A shape-shifting snake exacts vengeance on a group of friends for a crime they did not even commit.

movies.title: Saindhav
movies.description: The protagonist, with a past, has to cross paths with the underworld if he has to save his daughter from a health crisis and time is running out.

movies.title: Aavesham
movies.description: Three teenagers reach Bangalore for their engineering degree and gets involved in a fight with seniors. They find a local gangster named Ranga to help them take revenge.

movies.title: Masaan
movies.description: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

movies.title: Maharaja
movies.description: A barber seeks vengeance after his home is burglarized, cryptically telling police his "lakshmi" has been taken, leaving them uncertain if it's a person or object. His quest to recover the elusive "lakshmi" unfolds.

movies.title: Kakuda
movies.description: This horror-comedy film follows a town trapped in time by a curse and 3 of its inhabitants face a ghost that makes them question superstition, tradition and love.

movies.title: Kaliyugam Pattanamlo
movies.description: Revolves around twins Vijay and Sagar, where Sagar's troubling behavior results in institutionalization, while Vijay studies engineering, showcasing their divergent life paths over the years.

movies.title: Radhe Shyam
movies.description: Love blooms between a doctor with an uncertain future and a renowned palmist who thought he would never find love. His beliefs are challenged.

movies.title: Tumbbad
movies.director: Rahi Anil Barve, Anand Gandhi, Adesh Prasad
movies.description: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

movies.title: Vettaiyan
movies.description: Ruthless criminal activity is met with force from a maverick police officer with a disregard for the rules as he confronts an outbreak of lawlessness.

movies.title: 777 Charlie
movies.description: Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

movies.title: Shyam Singha Roy
movies.description: Centers in the theme of reincarnation, unfolding in Kolkata and Hyderabad.
